snippet: Big United States banks reported lower exposure to Russia in the first quarter, as Western nations imposed sanctions on some of the country’s citizens and businesses in response to its seizure of the Crimean Peninsula from Ukraine.
abstract: Large United States banks report lower exposure to Russia in first quarter, as Western nations impose sanctions on some of country’s citizens and businesses in response to its seizure of Crimean Peninsula from Ukraine.
lead_paragraph: Big United States banks reported lower exposure to Russia in the first quarter, as Western nations imposed sanctions on some of the country’s citizens and businesses in response to its seizure of the Crimean Peninsula from Ukraine.

headline.main: Large Banks Cut Back on Risk in Russia
headline.print_headline: Large Banks Cut Back on Risk in Russia
